content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":415310,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/68956ce8-c4fc-40ab-8fd9-412836e641f7/14.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/68956ce8-c4fc-40ab-8fd9-412836e641f7/14.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"14.png\",\"name\":\"14.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"68956ce8-c4fc-40ab-8fd9-412836e641f7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":881,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Earlier you've received the \\\"Welcome to EPAM\\\" letter, so you already know where and at what time your first EPAM day begins.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It starts in the EPAM office where you'll be invited to fill in some documents, sign NDA contract and take a photo for EPAM internal systems. Our Onboarding specialist will meet you and you'll have an introduction to EPAM, get acquainted with internal tools, rules and optionally you will have a short office tour.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The tentative schedule of your Induction day you can find in the “Welcome to EPAM” letter.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After Induction presentations you'll meet your HR Contact from People Management Team - whose aim is to help you integrate into EPAM and provide you informational support during the probation period.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Final step for your first day is to meet your Resource Manager and team. Check your working place, get acquainted with your first tasks and enjoy being part of the global EPAM team.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
